about: Software developer with 4+ years of experience specializing in full-stack web development. Passionate about creating clean, maintainable code and improving **user** *experiences(*. Strong background in React ecosystem and modern JavaScript development practices.

experience.summary: Lead frontend developer for the company's main financial dashboard product, managing a team of three developers.

projects.name: Dashboard Redesign
projects.description: Led complete redesign of main dashboard interface, resulting in 40% improvement in user engagement and 25% reduction in customer support tickets.

projects.name: Performance Optimization
projects.description: Improved application loading time by 60% through code splitting and lazy loading implementation.

experience.summary: Developed and maintained multiple client websites and web applications.

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Built responsive e-commerce platform serving 10,000+ daily users, integrating with Stripe and inventory management systems.

projects.name: Health Tracker App
projects.description: Full-stack application for tracking fitness goals and nutrition. Features include workout planning, meal tracking, and progress visualization.
